DOC.brief_summary: In study , participant Stage IB/II-IIIA non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) undergone surgical resection ( lobectomy pneumonectomy ) without adjuvant chemotherapy treat pembrolizumab placebo . The primary study hypothesis pembrolizumab provide improve disease-free survival ( DFS ) versus placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Study Pembrolizumab ( MK-3475 ) v Placebo Participants With Non-small Cell Lung Cancer After Resection With Without Standard Adjuvant Therapy ( MK-3475-091/KEYNOTE-091 )
